circuit-sat.name: Circuit-SAT
circuit-sat.description: Does a boolean circuit have a satisfying assignment?

cnf-sat.name: CNF-SAT
cnf-sat.description: Does a boolean formula in conjunctive normal form have a satisfying assignment?

indset.name: Independent Set
indset.description: Is there a subset of size at least k of vertices of an undirected graph such that no 2 vertices in the subset have an edge between them in the graph?

vertex-cover.name: Vertex Cover
vertex-cover.description: Is there a subset of size at most k of vertices of an undirected graph such that every edge has an endpoint in the subset?

clique.name: Clique
clique.description: Does a graph have a complete subgraph of size k?
